title: VOCO SIM
description: The game was created by a team of five during a school hackathon for the school's Open Doors Day.

title: GetScambo
description: An game where player should learn to recognize scam emails. The game was created as a part of a school project.

title: VotingSys
description: Simple web app what demostrate how voting system works. The app was created as a part of a school project.

title: FiveM Admin Panel
description: Admin panel for FiveM servers that allows server admins to manage players, view logs, and perform various administrative tasks.

title: FiveM MDT System
description: MDT (Mobile Data Terminal) system for FiveM servers that allows law enforcement officers to access and manage information about vehicles, warrants, and other important data.

title: FiveM Special Vehicles System
description: Special Vehicles system for FiveM servers that allows players to see and buy their own vehicles.

title: To-Do App
description: A simple To-Do app with a clean and minimalistic design. The app allows you to add, delete and filter tasks. In private repository because of client request.

title: Weather App
description: App that allows user to search for any Estonian city and view its current weather. The app utilizes the OpenWeather API for retrieving weather data.
